{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Court of Fontaine|It|The Court of Fontaine}} was once the court of [[Focalors]], the God of Justice, established at least a thousand years ago. After the events of ''[[Masquerade of the Guilty]]'', the court is now under the purview of Chief Justice [[Neuvillette]].</p><p>The city is also the base of [[The Steambird]], a newspaper read all across [[Teyvat]].</p>}}

==Trivia==
* The Court of Fontaine is the only [[main city]] to contain a [[Statue of The Seven]].
* The Court of Fontaine is known for its beautiful maidens.<ref name="tatara">{{Ref/Quest|Tatara Tales (Quest)}}</ref>
* The [[Sojourner]], a harpist who would later join the [[Wanderer's Troupe]], was beloved by the women of the Court of Fontaine, and when he left without saying goodbye, the ladies of the Court wept.<ref>{{Ref/Weapon|The Stringless}}</ref>
* It is also known as the "City of the Arts."<ref>{{Ref/VO|Traveler|About Art...|nation=Fontaine}}</ref>
